name: zitadel
description: Zitadel is a self-hosted identity and access management platform with OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0 support. It offers multi-tenant projects, roles, and login flows and is available both self-hosted and as a managed cloud service.
features: Multi-tenancy: Manage multiple organizations and projects with isolated user bases and configurations in one instance.
OpenID Connect: Implement modern authentication flows with full OIDC support for web and mobile applications.
OAuth 2.0: Secure API access with standard OAuth flows including authorization code, client credentials, and device flow.
User management: Create and manage users with customizable profile fields, metadata, and authentication methods.
Role-based access: Define granular roles and permissions that control access to applications and resources.
Custom login flows: Configure authentication requirements including MFA, passwordless, and social login per application.
Branding customization: Personalize login pages, emails, and user interfaces with custom logos, colors, and text.
Audit logging: Track all authentication events, user actions, and administrative changes for compliance and security.
API-first design: Manage all aspects of identity and access through comprehensive REST and gRPC APIs.
Self-service portal: Allow users to manage their profiles, sessions, and security settings through a dedicated interface.
External identity providers: Integrate with Google, GitHub, Azure AD, and other providers for federated authentication.
Token management: Issue, validate, and revoke access tokens with configurable expiration and refresh policies.
